message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the performance measures of binary classification in class-imbalanced problems, which is a common issue in machine learning and data mining. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) as these fields often deal with classification problems. The paper also discusses cost functions, which is a topic in cryptography and security (cs.CR) and optimization (cs.DS).
